original_text: and have cast lots for my people, and have traded a boy for a prostitute, and have sold a girl for wine and have drunk it.
korean_text: 또 제비 뽑아 내 백성을 끌어 가서 소년을 기생과 바꾸며 소녀를 술과 바꾸어 마셨음이니라

sentences.original_text: and have cast lots for my people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 백성을 위해 제비를 뽑았다

sentences.original_text: and have traded a boy for a prostitute
and have sold a girl for wine
